Articles.Content:
True, you idiot.

The user below isn't ROFLCopter64bits. If the next user is ROFLCopter64bits, then the next user is using Windows.

True, False, [unknown].

The next user is located in Australia.

Edited April 29, 2013 by hawkinator

Not yet

The user below me is planning to defect to Australia

Half true. I plan to conquer Australia to prevent it from releasing its evil upon us.

User below me thinks I need to go back on my meds

Not sure...

The next user was sleeping.

False, but I probably should.

It's Monday where the next user lives.

Nope, it's friday

The user below me uses the Chinese calender system (It's currently the year 4649)

False. Silly chinese calender.

The user below me actually knows what Bubsy is.

Nope.

The user below forgot how to human.

Uhm... False?

The user below me is smuggling candy.

False, I kinda have a non-sweet tooth that hates candy.

The next user ocassionally wishes for sci-fi unobtanium.

False, I'd just end up selling it to the Japanese for research (I don't trust America, they'd probably try to make a weapon out of it)

The user below my is scared of something that can't hurt you, like mice or worms or small rooms

1/2 true. I'm afraid of spiders. Some are poisonous, some aren't.

The user below me likes only hard candies.

False, I have been known to eat entire boxes of Milky Ways.

The user below me has battled the snake men of Rulanda 5

True. It was a great day to battle.

The user below me has seen hell and lived to tell about it. (New Jersey)

True, I had to pass through it twice.

The user below me knows the meaning of love.

True, but I'm not sharing my secrets~<3

The user below me wants to know my secrets

True and false, I would but what's the fun in that? It's like watching a movie and getting the ending spoiled.

The user below me knows the meaning of life (AND IT'S NOT 42)

True, Women secrets are always the best

(NINJA! Meaning of Life is easy, Its whatever you want it to be)

The user below me knows their meaning of life

Ah, are we getting all philasophical now?

Well, I think (notice the word think) that the meaning of life is to live it with luxury, and a holodeck is the easiest way to achieve that

The user below me believes that a holodeck would mean the end of humanity.

False. We would have hit post-human before then.

The user below me has owned a small reptile before.

False.

The user below me knows why we would hit post-human by then.

True, people like you ^.^ AWWWW $#!{ SON!!!! *snap snap snap*

The user below me is prepared for the time when civilization collapses and moose rule the earth

False. Only for when the world where everyone is chobit invades us.

The user below me has played Bubsy. I'm suprised there are only like 2 people that do.

False, never played it but heard of it.

User below me fears my power.
